Internet Remarks: Spectacular Vancouver House! One of a few floor plans in the Architect Series with unobstructed views of English Bay and the North Shore Mountains. This signature building by the world renown Bjarke Ingels Group in conjunction with a leading developer, West Bank, is situated in the active waterfront Beach District. This West facing home offers 1333 sqft of indoor living space and 126 sqft outdoor patio with views of English Bay, Stanley Park and Northshore Mountains. Leading edge systems include heat recovery ventilation, water treatment, advanced security, 5 high speed elevators, and technology packages. Over height ceilings, open living area with floor to ceiling views, Miele appliances, and family room, are just some of the features of the home. Amenities include a pool, library, fitness centre and a fleet of BMW's. Don't miss this opportunity!
